resources.string: This app was made to help you memorize phone numbers. Whenever you call a number from your contact list, it will ask you to insert one or more numbers to complete it, and only dial if you do it correctly.
In this screen you can define the aplications settings:
Is the interception of calls active for each call you make?
Enabled for all contacts or specific?
Which type of game do you want to play?
I think this is the missing number!
Note: To disable memo please click the notification and disable the "Enabled Interception" option
The number guessing game is enabled, do you really know your contact numbers?
You\'ve got it! It is %d, now calling...

Libraries:
